title: Create Service Management UI Components
description: Develop UI components for service management including service listing, creation, and editing forms for service providers, and service approval/rejection for tenant administrators.

user_stories: As a service provider, I want to manage my services so that I can offer them to customers
As a customer, I need to browse services so that I can find what I need
business_rules: Service components must display service information clearly
Service creation form must validate all required fields
Service editing must preserve existing relationships
Service components must follow the design system
edge_cases: Handling large service lists with pagination
Managing service creation with validation errors
Handling service editing with concurrent users
Displaying service categories and filtering options

acceptance_criteria: Service listing component displays services with filtering and sorting
Service creation form validates all required fields
Service components follow the design system
Service components handle error states properly

endpoints.description: Get all services with optional filtering

integration_tests: Service management workflow with backend APIs
Service listing with filtering and sorting

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Angular best practices for component development. Implement proper form handling and validation. Ensure components integrate well with service management APIs.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for service management actions. Validate all user inputs to prevent injection attacks.

subtasks.title: Create Tenant Admin Service Approval Component
subtasks.description: Develop UI component for tenant administrators to review and approve/reject service listings.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After FE-002, FE-005-01, and BE-XXX-02 completion

acceptance_criteria: Component displays a list of services with pending approval status.
Allows tenant admin to view service details.
Provides buttons to approve or reject services.
Integrates with backend API for approval/rejection actions.
Component follows design system and is responsive.

additional_context.technical_notes: Use AG Grid for service listing if applicable. Implement modal or new page for detail view and approval/rejection reasons. Ensure proper status updates after actions.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure only authorized tenant admins can approve/reject services. Validate input for rejection reasons.
